Title: Om Shanti Om
Genre: Action, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Musical, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Farah Khan (story), Mushtaq Sheikh (screenplay), Farah Khan (screenplay), Mayur Puri (dialogue)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kirron Kher, Shreyas Talpade
Plot: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.
